title: Bug in Login Page
description: Users are experiencing difficulty logging in. The login button is unresponsive.

title: Performance Degradation on Dashboard
description: The dashboard is loading slowly, impacting the overall user experience.

title: Mobile Responsiveness Issue
description: The website is not displaying properly on mobile devices, with elements overlapping.

title: Data Sync Error in Analytics Module
description: The analytics module is not syncing data properly, leading to inaccurate reports.

title: Broken Image Links in Knowledge Base
description: Several images in the knowledge base articles are not loading, showing broken links.

title: Incorrect Billing Information Displayed
description: Users are reporting discrepancies in the billing information displayed on their accounts.

title: Email Notifications Not Being Sent
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for important updates and actions on the platform.

title: 404 Error on Product Pages
description: Clicking on certain product pages results in a 404 error, preventing access to product details.

title: Search Functionality Not Working
description: The search feature is not returning relevant results, making it difficult for users to find information.

title: Broken Checkout Process
description: Users are unable to complete the checkout process, encountering errors during payment.

title: SSL Certificate Expiry Warning
description: The SSL certificate is set to expire soon, and there is a need for renewal to ensure secure connections.

title: Missing Product Images in Gallery
description: Some product images are not appearing in the gallery, affecting the visual representation of products.

title: Login Session Timeout Too Short
description: Users are being logged out too quickly due to a short session timeout, causing frustration.

title: Unable to Upload Attachments in Support Tickets
description: Customers are encountering issues when trying to attach files to their support tickets.

title: Inconsistent Font Rendering Across Browsers
description: Font rendering varies across different browsers, leading to an inconsistent visual experience.

title: Accessibility Issues for Screen Readers
description: Certain elements on the website are not properly accessible for users relying on screen readers.

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility Problem
description: The website does not display consistently across various browsers, affecting user experience.

title: API Integration Failure with Third-Party Service
description: The API integration with a third-party service is failing, impacting data synchronization.

title: Missing Terms of Service Link
description: The terms of service link is missing from the footer, violating legal compliance standards.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: There are intermittent timeouts in the database connection, leading to service disruptions.
